doctor.name: Dr. Md. Naimul Haque
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Naimul Haque is a Eye Specialist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (EYE), Fellow (Vitreo Retina), Fellow (LVPEI). He is a Consultant, Ophthalmology at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Rajshahi Retina and Faco Center. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Naimul Haque at Rajshahi Retina and Faco Center is 3pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Nurul Islam
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Nurul Islam is a Eye Specialist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, DO, FCPS. He is a Associate professor & Head, Ophthalmology at Islami Bank Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Islami Bank Hospital, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Nurul Islam at Islami Bank Hospital, Rajshahi is 9am to 2pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Tanzila Alam
doctor.info: Dr. Tanzila Alam is a Eye Specialist in Rajshahi. Her qualification is MBBS, DO (DU), FRSH (UK), Training (Singapore). She is working as a Eye Specialist & Surgeon doctor in Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Rajshahi Royal Hospital Pvt. Ltd.. Practicing hour of Dr. Tanzila Alam at Rajshahi Royal Hospital Pvt. Ltd. is 4pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Badiuzzaman
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Badiuzzaman is a Eye Specialist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, DO (DU), PhD (EYE). He is a Former Associate professor, Ophthalmology at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Islami Bank Hospital, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Badiuzzaman at Islami Bank Hospital, Rajshahi is 5pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Sultanul Haq Aftabi
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Sultanul Haq Aftabi is a Eye Specialist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, MCPS, DO. He is a Associate professor, Ophthalmology at Islami Bank Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Islami Bank Hospital, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Sultanul Haq Aftabi at Islami Bank Hospital, Rajshahi is 2pm to 7pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Tobibur Rahman Sheikh

He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Rajshahi Metropolitan Hospital. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Tobibur Rahman Sheikh at Rajshahi Metropolitan Hospital is 3pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
